$interpreted: Pang: Damnit!
Pang: Can't believe I got them caught up in this mess!
Pang: (Why would Yan-Bo give me the holy talisman? Could it be that...)
Pang: Eh? A note?
Pang: (Did someone throw it through that grate...?)
Pang: This handwriting—Yao!?
Pang: No... how!? Yao's dead!
Pang: But this is definitely Yao's handwriting...
Pang: "I planted the talisman. I'm sorry. Now fight."
Pang: (That's definitely his style, too... But that means Yao's alive... and he's framed me!?)
Pang: (All because he wants me to represent the Tiger Tribe in their tournament? For what!?)
Maeok: I've distracted the guards, there shouldn't be anyone here to bother us.
Juan-Yun: Pang, we're here to check—
Juan-Yun: Pang, you look terrible! Why are you so pale? Are you hurt?
Pang: I'm fine!
Juan-Yun: ...Good, then. Well, we're here to—
Pang: Are Puggi and Hestia okay?
Maeok: They're fine, for now. But I can't guarantee it'll stay that way.
Maeok: That talisman... Yan-Bo gave that to you? Yan-Bo of the Capybara Tribe?
Pang: ...Yes. Let me tell you what happened...
Juan-Yun: Maeok?
Maeok: ......
Maeok: ...If you're telling the truth, then it seems he has no intention of returning. How was I supposed to know where he went...
Maeok: I still don't entirely believe you, but it seems like the person you describe is truly Yan-Bo.
Maeok: A lot of this is suspicious, but I trust Yan-Bo.
Maeok: Juan-Yun and I will do our best to help you.
Pang: Thank you, Arbiter Maeok!
Maeok: You should be thanking Juan-Yun. He's come up with a plan, if you're willing to play along.
Juan-Yun: For now, Maeok will pretend like she's here to question you. She'll keep your friends in custody so Sennosuke can't interfere.
Juan-Yun: But he's bought most people in the Alliance, so Maeok won't be able to shut him out for long... unless...
Pang: Unless?
Maeok: Well, you know how important the Martial Arts Tournament is.
Maeok: In order to make sure it goes smoothly, the Alliance puts any criminal investigations involving a contestant on hold.
Juan-Yun: So, as long as you're willing to join the tournament, then Maeok will have a reason to keep Hestia and Puggi in custody longer.
Pang: And they'll be safe in custody?
Maeok: Until the tournament is over, yes. And yet... if you join the tournament, then you'll be admitting you stole the Tiger Tribe's holy talisman.
Maeok: So, unless you can win, there'll be an even greater punishment waiting for you at the end.
Maeok: This is a big decision, with severe ramifications. Think it over. You can tell me tomorrow if need be.
Pang: No need. I will join the tournament.
Maeok: Are you sure?
Pang: If it means saving my friends, then yes.
Pang: (And Yao... did Yao really write that? I must get to the bottom of this...)
Maeok: ...I understand. Then you will be let out shortly to prepare for the tournament.
Juan-Yun: Pang, I'm sorry. This is all I could think of.
Pang: You've done more than enough, qilin lord. I am grateful.
Juan-Yun: Well... then I wish you luck. I should get going before the guards return. Goodbye for now.
Pang: Yao... is it really you?
Pang: Puggi, Hestia... I'll save you both!
Alliance Soldier: Traitor!
Alliance Soldier: Damn thief! What are you doing representing our tribe!?
Alliance Soldier: Just give up! We got a fresh grave dug for you, right next to your buddy Yao!
Pang: I'm afraid I can't do that!
Alliance Soldier: Then you asked for it!
Pang: We're all tigers, so I went easy on you.
Pang: Get out of here.
Alliance Soldier: Hmph!
Pang: You...
Alliance Soldier: You couldn't beat General Yu, so you hid in the shadows. Coward like you shouldn't call himself part of the Tiger Tribe!
Alliance Soldier: No point talking to this loser anymore. You're on your own now, traitor.
Tindoiimu: So you're just going to stand and watch? Not try to be the hero?
Juan-Yun: He didn't protest at all... he must have expected this. And it's not my place to step in.
Jia-Shen: ...Pang?
Pang: Jia-Shen!? What are you doing here!?
Jia-Shen: Well I'll be, it is you! Didn't think ya'd still remember me after all this time.
Pang: Of course I do. But shouldn't you be in the desert?
Jia-Shen: Hah, it's a long story. I came here on some official business, then heard you'd come and got yerself into a bit of trouble.
Jia-Shen: Any way I could help?
Pang: Of course not! I'm a wanted man. I can't bring you into this.
Jia-Shen: —You don't think I can help, is that it?
Pang: Of course that's not what I—
Jia-Shen: I remember you sayin', back in the Desert Kingdom, it's not about yer ability, it's about yer will.
Jia-Shen: So maybe I ain't the strongest tortoise in the east, but I want to help, Pang!
Pang: Jia-Shen...
Pang: It's good to see an old friend.
Tindoiimu: ...I'm sure he feels horrible. Rejected by his own kind, only getting help from a tortoise and a qilin.
Juan-Yun: The east is complicated. Not everyone is the same, even those of the same tribe. And those from different tribes are not necessarily enemies.
Tindoiimu: ...Are you saying I should work together with the Alliance.
Juan-Yun: Would that be so bad?
Juan-Yun: Much like your butterfly. Is it not the reason we now work together, and trust each other?
Tindoiimu: (Work together... with the Alliance?)
Tindoiimu: (...No, we're mortal enemies. That's impossible!)
Tindoiimu: It'll never happen.
Tindoiimu: We're just tools to them.
Juan-Yun: Is that right...
Juan-Yun: ...My mistake, then.

Model.Text: Damnit!
Can't believe I got them caught up in this mess!
(Why would Yan-Bo give me the holy talisman? Could it be that...)
Eh? A note?
(Did someone throw it through that grate...?)
This handwriting—Yao!?
No... how!? Yao's dead!
But this is definitely Yao's handwriting...
"I planted the talisman. I'm sorry. Now fight."
(That's definitely his style, too... But that means Yao's alive... and he's framed me!?)
(All because he wants me to represent the Tiger Tribe in their tournament? For what!?)
I've distracted the guards, there shouldn't be anyone here to bother us.
Pang, we're here to check—
Pang, you look terrible! Why are you so pale? Are you hurt?
I'm fine!
...Good, then. Well, we're here to—
Are Puggi and Hestia okay?
They're fine, for now. But I can't guarantee it'll stay that way.
That talisman... Yan-Bo gave that to you? Yan-Bo of the Capybara Tribe?
...Yes. Let me tell you what happened...
Maeok?
...If you're telling the truth, then it seems he has no intention of returning. How was I supposed to know where he went...
I still don't entirely believe you, but it seems like the person you describe is truly Yan-Bo.
A lot of this is suspicious, but I trust Yan-Bo.
Juan-Yun and I will do our best to help you.
Thank you, Arbiter Maeok!
You should be thanking Juan-Yun. He's come up with a plan, if you're willing to play along.
For now, Maeok will pretend like she's here to question you. She'll keep your friends in custody so Sennosuke can't interfere.
But he's bought most people in the Alliance, so Maeok won't be able to shut him out for long... unless...
Unless?
Well, you know how important the Martial Arts Tournament is.
In order to make sure it goes smoothly, the Alliance puts any criminal investigations involving a contestant on hold.
So, as long as you're willing to join the tournament, then Maeok will have a reason to keep Hestia and Puggi in custody longer.
And they'll be safe in custody?
Until the tournament is over, yes. And yet... if you join the tournament, then you'll be admitting you stole the Tiger Tribe's holy talisman.
So, unless you can win, there'll be an even greater punishment waiting for you at the end.
This is a big decision, with severe ramifications. Think it over. You can tell me tomorrow if need be.
No need. I will join the tournament.
Are you sure?
If it means saving my friends, then yes.
(And Yao... did Yao really write that? I must get to the bottom of this...)
...I understand. Then you will be let out shortly to prepare for the tournament.
Pang, I'm sorry. This is all I could think of.
You've done more than enough, qilin lord. I am grateful.
Well... then I wish you luck. I should get going before the guards return. Goodbye for now.
Yao... is it really you?
Puggi, Hestia... I'll save you both!
Traitor!
Damn thief! What are you doing representing our tribe!?
Just give up! We got a fresh grave dug for you, right next to your buddy Yao!
I'm afraid I can't do that!
Then you asked for it!
We're all tigers, so I went easy on you.
Get out of here.
Hmph!
You...
You couldn't beat General Yu, so you hid in the shadows. Coward like you shouldn't call himself part of the Tiger Tribe!
No point talking to this loser anymore. You're on your own now, traitor.
So you're just going to stand and watch? Not try to be the hero?
He didn't protest at all... he must have expected this. And it's not my place to step in.
...Pang?
Jia-Shen!? What are you doing here!?
Well I'll be, it is you! Didn't think ya'd still remember me after all this time.
Of course I do. But shouldn't you be in the desert?
Hah, it's a long story. I came here on some official business, then heard you'd come and got yerself into a bit of trouble.
Any way I could help?
Of course not! I'm a wanted man. I can't bring you into this.
—You don't think I can help, is that it?
Of course that's not what I—
I remember you sayin', back in the Desert Kingdom, it's not about yer ability, it's about yer will.
So maybe I ain't the strongest tortoise in the east, but I want to help, Pang!
Jia-Shen...
It's good to see an old friend.
...I'm sure he feels horrible. Rejected by his own kind, only getting help from a tortoise and a qilin.
The east is complicated. Not everyone is the same, even those of the same tribe. And those from different tribes are not necessarily enemies.
...Are you saying I should work together with the Alliance.
Would that be so bad?
Much like your butterfly. Is it not the reason we now work together, and trust each other?
(Work together... with the Alliance?)
(...No, we're mortal enemies. That's impossible!)
It'll never happen.
We're just tools to them.
Is that right...
...My mistake, then.

What are you doing representing our tribe!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3421c4","IconName":"t3421c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just give up! We got a fresh grave dug for you, right next to your buddy Yao!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm afraid I can't do that!","sfxName":"t0017_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_23_003","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3421c4","IconName":"t3421c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Then you asked for it!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We're all tigers, so I went easy on you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Get out of here.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3421c4","IconName":"t3421c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3421c4","IconName":"t3421c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You couldn't beat General Yu, so you hid in the shadows. Coward like you shouldn't call himself part of the Tiger Tribe!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_25_003","SpeakerName":"Alliance Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3421c4","IconName":"t3421c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No point talking to this loser anymore. You're on your own now, traitor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So you're just going to stand and watch? Not try to be the hero?","sfxName":"h0183sx_story_002_b","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He didn't protest at all... he must have expected this. And it's not my place to step in.","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Pang?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Jia-Shen!? What are you doing here!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well I'll be, it is you! Didn't think ya'd still remember me after all this time.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course I do. But shouldn't you be in the desert?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_28_003","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hah, it's a long story. I came here on some official business, then heard you'd come and got yerself into a bit of trouble.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_28_004","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Any way I could help?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course not! I'm a wanted man. I can't bring you into this.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014You don't think I can help, is that it?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course that's not what I\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I remember you sayin', back in the Desert Kingdom, it's not about yer ability, it's about yer will.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Jia-Shen","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0156","IconName":"t0156s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So maybe I ain't the strongest tortoise in the east, but I want to help, Pang!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Jia-Shen...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's good to see an old friend.","sfxName":"t0017_story_025","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I'm sure he feels horrible. Rejected by his own kind, only getting help from a tortoise and a qilin. ","sfxName":"h0183sx_story_002_b","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The east is complicated. Not everyone is the same, even those of the same tribe. And those from different tribes are not necessarily enemies.","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Are you saying I should work together with the Alliance. ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Would that be so bad?","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Much like your butterfly. Is it not the reason we now work together, and trust each other?","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_34_003","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Work together... with the Alliance?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp5","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...No, we're mortal enemies. That's impossible!)","sfxName":"h0183sx_story_008_b","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It'll never happen.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We're just tools to them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Is that right...","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_306_003_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Juan-Yun","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0181","IconName":"t0181s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...My mistake, then. ","sfxName":"t0181sx_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
